statements: SELECT material_id, material_name, material_type, quantity, unit_of_measurement FROM GreenBuildingInventory;
SELECT material_name, material_type, quantity FROM GreenBuildingInventory WHERE unit_of_measurement = 'sq. ft';
SELECT quantity, material_name, unit_of_measurement FROM GreenBuildingInventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingInventory WHERE material_type = 'Insulation' AND quantity > 100;
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM GreenBuildingInventory WHERE unit_of_measurement = 'lbs' ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingInventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_id, material_name, unit_of_measurement FROM GreenBuildingInventory WHERE material_type = 'Concrete' ORDER BY material_name;
SELECT material_name, material_type, quantity FROM GreenBuildingInventory WHERE unit_of_measurement = 'lbs' AND quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT material_id, material_name, quantity FROM GreenBuildingInventory WHERE quantity < 5 OR quantity > 20 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingInventory WHERE material_name LIKE '%wood%' AND quantity >= 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC, material_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Materials;
SELECT name, category, quantity FROM Materials WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT material_id, name, unit, price FROM Materials ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Projects;
SELECT name, location, start_date, end_date FROM Projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Materials WHERE category = 'Wood' AND quantity > 50 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT name, quantity, price FROM Materials WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC
SELECT material_id, name, unit FROM Materials ORDER BY name
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM Materials
SELECT * FROM Projects WHERE location IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles')
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingProjects;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM GreenBuildingProjects;
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM GreenBuildingProjects ORDER BY project_location DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaterialsInventory WHERE material_category = 'Concrete';
SELECT material_name, material_quantity, material_price FROM MaterialsInventory WHERE material_price > 50;
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingProjects;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM GreenBuildingProjects WHERE project_location='New York';
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM GreenBuildingProjects WHERE project_id=1;
SELECT * FROM MaterialsInventory WHERE material_quantity > 100 AND material_price < 50;
SELECT material_name, material_category, material_quantity FROM MaterialsInventory WHERE material_category='Concrete' ORDER BY material_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Materials;
SELECT material_id, material_name, quantity FROM Materials WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Resources WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT material_name, unit FROM Materials ORDER BY unit DESC;
SELECT * FROM Materials ORDER BY material_id DESC, material_name ASC
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM Materials WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT * FROM Resources WHERE type = 'Tool' AND location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY resource_id
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT m.material_name, r.resource_name, i.quantity FROM Inventory i JOIN Materials m ON i.material_id = m.material_id JOIN Resources r ON i.resource_id = r.resource_id
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_id, material_name, quantity FROM materials ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT t.transaction_id, p.project_name, m.material_name FROM transactions t JOIN project_materials pm ON t.project_material_id = pm.project_material_id JOIN projects p ON pm.project_id = p.project_id JOIN materials m ON pm.material_id = m.material_id;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE material_name = 'Concrete' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NULL;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT p.project_name, m.material_name, pm.quantity_used FROM projects p JOIN project_materials pm ON p.project_id = pm.project_id JOIN materials m ON pm.material_id = m.material_id;
